title: Save My Chatbot
content: I am using Save My Chatbot on a MacBook Pro M2 with Sequoia 15.5 and using Word to open the saved file. Often the file contains nothing or just a couple scraps of 5 or 10 short lines of text. Are any of these applications responsible for not saving the information from Perplexity completely and correctly. Much of the time it is completely worthless. Is there a better app for any of these steps? Thank you. Dennis
creator: singstock.dennis

title: Lost all windows and tabs
content: Firefox on my mac has been acting buggy lately. The last time I quit and reopened it, all of my windows and tabs were gone. there is no restore previous session available and the recently closed tabs and windows options are grayed out. How can I restore?
creator: jlsandler

title: browser keeps crashing
content: since the last firefox automatic update my browser keeps crashing at least once an hour. NOTES ARE AS FOLLOWS caused by: EOF while parsing a value at line 1 column 0
creator: b13islas

title: Bad Request
content:
Bad Request Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand. Size of a request header field exceeds server limit.

How can I get rid of this? Prevents access to important account.
creator: bandkhoyt

title: downloaded Firefox to a new computer, but the bookmarks are NINE YEARS OLD!
content: THis morning, the motherboard on my laptop crashed SO I went to WalMart and bought a new one I downloaded Firefox..........and the bookmarks are 9 years old. And the bookmarks is where I keep 100s of passwords. I have to have them!
creator: thouser98
